VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Barley?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Barley is arc {Oats}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Soybeans?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Soybeans is arc {Wheat}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Barley to Oats in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Soybeans to Barley in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Potatoes and Barley in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Potatoes and Barley is {171}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Wheat and Potatoes in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Wheat and Potatoes is {248}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Barley?
SC.A: The total flow output from Barley is {669}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Potatoes?
SC.A: The total flow input by Potatoes is {907}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 400? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {412} from {Oats} to {Barley}, a flow of {407} from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 134? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {61} from {Wheat} to {Soybeans}, a flow of {101} from {Soybeans} to {Wheat}, a flow of {103} from {Potatoes} to {Barley}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 168 and 291? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {249} from {Soybeans} to {Barley}, a flow of {248} from {Potatoes} to {Wheat}, a flow of {171} from {Barley} to {Potatoes}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Soybeans to Barley or from Wheat to Potatoes?
NC.A: The flow from {Wheat} to {Potatoes} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Oats to Barley, from Potatoes to Barley, or from Potatoes to Soybeans?
NC.A: The flow from {Oats} to {Barley} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Oats}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Potatoes} and {Soybeans}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Wheat, Arc Potatoes, Arc Soybeans, Arc Barley, Arc Oats}.
